name: UnBEARableNewsNetwork
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With the current politically correct climate, it is hard to ever have good time. Even comedians are being censored for making jokes about the wrong things. Owen Benjamin and the UnBEARables, to solve the problem, came up with the UnBEARable News Network. We make fun of things that ought to be poked fun of. That is one of the beauties of comedy. Sometimes it seems that satire and humorous news seems to be more accurate at portraying the news than most news outlets. This is mostly because of hyperbole and sarcasm. We may be lying, but we're not wrong.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
